decision_conditions: Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) of planning permission ref. 64322/APP/2017/3185, dated 20-02-2019, is amended to:
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:
Thereafter, the development shall be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Conditions 2 which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to planning permission ref. 64322/APP/2017/3185, dated 20-02-2019, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
The following plans have been SUPERSEDED:
The following plans have been APPROVED:
description: Non-material Amendment to planning permission ref. 64322/APP/2017/3185 dated 20-02-2019 (Provision of a new three-storey linked building, accommodating school hall, Sixth Form centre, classrooms, staff and ancillary facilities; single storey extension to changing rooms; enhancement of the central courtyard with associated hard and soft landscaping; additional cycle storage; and ancillary development) as amended by planning permission ref. 64322/APP/2019/3784 dated 25-11-2019. The proposed amendments involve alterations to three external staircases.
